name: "The Dresden Files" - "Walls" Online Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Harry's father was also a trained wizard.
questions.explanation:
False.

	In the opening voice over Harry mentions that his father couldn't use real magic so instead he used gadgets to sell his tricks. Harry himself couldn't use technology and still had a rotary phone.

questions.text: In the opening scene a woman was killed outside of Dresden's office. How did she die?
questions.explanation:
Hit by a car.

	She had been in Harry's shop moments before, but Harry wasn't in. They passed each other as they she was leaving. Harry started to chat with her and she was struck by a car in front of the shop.

questions.text: What did Dresden find inside the vehicle the murderer had stolen?
questions.explanation:
Tallow.

	Tallow is rendered animal fat used in making candles. Dresden saw the substance all over the cup holder inside the crashed car.

questions.text: What did Harry find while searching the dead woman's apartment?
questions.explanation:
Stolen jewelry.

	He was attacked by a man wearing a dark hooded sweatshirt while looking in the apartment. He managed to keep the necklace he'd found during the struggle. Using that necklace he managed to start to piece together clues towards why the girl was killed.

questions.text: Who was the first person Harry tried to get him to help discover the source of the dark magic?
questions.explanation:
Donald Morgan.

	He went to the Warden, Donald Morgan, and asked for help. They two men didn't see eye-to-eye and had a slight argument. During the spat Harry asked why Morgan hadn't been there to stop his father from being murdered. After that Morgan gave him a small piece of information and left.

questions.text: What did Harry use as a listening device?
questions.explanation:
Flies.

	He had enchanted three flies. He held them to him ears several times and then released them from a jar to sneak into a house where the three criminals were hanging out and discussing some of their crimes.

questions.text: How were the men stealing from businesses?
questions.correct: Using magic to walk through walls
options: Using magic to walk through walls
Using guns to rob from them
questions.explanation:
Using magic to walk through walls.

	They had a dark magic talisman that allowed them to walk straight through walls, leaving them undetected by security systems. The magic was starting to corrupt their minds though and caused the girl to seek Dresden's help at the start of the episode. When they went to rob a bank the item didn't work right and one of the three men was cut in half walking through the bank vault.

The coroner.

	Waldo was in several episodes of the show. He was played by Matt Gordon. Waldo was a straight-laced medical examiner. He always presented Lt. Murphy with details on deaths in the various episodes. In this episode he revealed that one of the thieves was rotting from the inside out when he was killed.

questions.text: Which criminal was possessed by Caleb?
questions.explanation:
Brady.

	The thieves were using the hand, which was the real hand of a dead thief named Caleb. They used the hand to walk through walls. When it was used Caleb got stronger in each use and the man using it got a little weaker. Brady was played by Steve Byers.

questions.text: Who was the only of thieves to survive?
questions.explanation:
Dante.

	Dante had joined the group because he needed money to help pay his mother's hospital bills. Dante was the only one of them able to turn down the pull of the black magic, and eventually because of him Dresden was able to destroy Caleb.
